ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: and left the later people saying of them,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: and preserved for them a good name among posterity.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: and perpetuated their praise in later generations.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And We kept their praise among the latter generations.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And We left for them among the later generations.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And We perpetuated (praise) to them among the later generations.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: and left for them among the later folk
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And We left for them among the later folk (the salutation):
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: and We left them thus to be succeeded by a group [of followers] among later generations:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And We left for the twain among the posterity:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: and left for them a good name in posterity.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And We left (this blessing) for them among generations (to come) in later times:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And We left for them (a goodly remembrance) among generations (to come) in later times;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: And We let it (the beautiful praise) remain upon on both of them in the latter (generations),
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And We left with them for later generations.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And We left for them [favorable mention] among later generations:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [37:119] and We left, We preserved, for them among posterity, fair praise [namely]:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: 514 (And We left for them) for Moses and Aaron, (among the later folk (the salutation)) good praise among the people who came after them:
